content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you, Maria. I understand that you are interested in renting my apartment in New York. I'm happy to discuss the rental price with you. What is your budget for a monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Maria Mamani: "I'm looking for the lowest possible price. Can you tell me the price?"

Mister Heine: "The monthly rental for the apartment is €800. It includes utilities and other expenses. However, I can offer you a discount of €50 if you sign a one-year lease."
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for the information, Mister Heine. That sounds like a fair price for the apartment. I can agree to the price of €800 for a monthly rental. I am interested in signing a one-year lease, so I can take advantage of the discount of €50.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Maria Mamani: "Great, I agree to the price of €800 for a monthly rental. I will sign the lease as soon as possible."

Mister Heine: "Thank you, Maria. I'm glad to hear that you agree to the price. I will send you a lease agreement to sign and return as soon as I can. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns."
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I appreciate your offer and I'm excited to move into the apartment. I will sign the lease agreement as soon as I receive it. I don't have any questions or concerns at the moment, but please let me know if there's anything else I need to know.
name: Heinrich Heine
